Message: How was my performance? Please, be sincere.
Your pitch was slightly off-key in some parts, but your tone and emotion were spot-on! You really connected with the audience.
A friend of mine, told me, my performance was very bad. What do you think about it?
I'm sorry to hear that. However, as an objective observer, I can assure you that your performance had its strengths. Maybe your friend was having a bad day or didn't fully appreciate your art.
Dont you think, I should attend singing course, to improve my skills?

Absolutely! Taking a singing course would help you refine your technique, especially with regards to pitch control. But don't forget to nurture your unique style and emotional connection with your audience.
